Title: Gateway of the Caucasus
Notes: An intrepid band of climbers make it their goal in life to scale the lofty Kazbak and to return from same safely

Title: The White Tower
Notes: In the Swiss Alps , a woman is determined to make a climb where her father was killed

Title: Third Man on the Mountain
Notes: A Walt Disney tale of a Swiss man 's perilous experience on the Citadel

Title: The EIger Sanction
Notes: A fictional thriller about a paid assassin ( Clint Eastwood ) on a treacherous Eiger climb

Title: K2
Notes: Loosely based on real events , a pair of weekend-climber Americans join a team scaling the second-highest peak on Earth

Title: Vertical Limit
Notes: A retired climber 's sister makes an attempt to reach the top of K2

Title: Touching the Void
Notes: True story about a harrowing 1985 expedition in the Andes

Title: To the Limit
Notes: A German-made documentary chronicling an adventure in Yosemite National Park

Title: The Climb
Notes: A Canadian returns to Mount Everest 25 years after a life-altering experience there

Title: North Face
Notes: Based on a 1936 climb up the Eiger 's north face that ended disastrously

Title: The Wildest Dream
Notes: The famed George Mallory 's 1924 disappearance from Mount Everest is recounted

Title: The Summit
Notes: An account of the lives impacted by the 2008 K2 disaster

Title: Everest
Notes: Story of the 1996 Mount Everest disaster

Title: Meru
Notes: Chronicles the first ascent of The Shark 's Fin , a famously difficult route to the summit of Meru Peak in the Indian Himalayas

Title: Poorna : Courage Has No Limit
Notes: Hindi-language film about Malavath Purna , a girl from a tribal background in South India who became the youngest girl to reach the summit of Mount Everest

Title: Free Solo
Notes: A chronicle of Alex Honnold 's 2017 ascent of El Capitan , the first ever accomplished as a free solo . Oscar for Best Documentary Feature
